scripts.orch:grafana: OTLP_HOST=grafana OTLP_PORT=4317 docker compose -f packages/orchestrated/compose.yml --profile grafana up -d
scripts.orch:jaeger: OTLP_HOST=jaeger OTLP_PORT=4317 docker compose -f packages/orchestrated/compose.yml --profile jaeger up -d
scripts.orch:down: docker compose -f packages/orchestrated/compose.yml --profile aspire --profile grafana --profile jaeger down -v
scripts.orch:logs: docker compose -f packages/orchestrated/compose.yml logs -f | pnpm exec log-highlight
scripts.mono:start-services: pnpm --filter @lazyapps/demo-monolith run start-mongo && pnpm --filter @lazyapps/demo-monolith run start-aspire
